content: They can "pick off the herd" -- hit one industry at a time until so many people have Smart Cards no one is left to resist. Those with the Smart Cards may even begin to think it would be "just" if everyone had one. It's a classic totalitarian strategy, summed up by the German Pastor Martin Niemoller . . . "...first (they came) for the Communists, And I didn't speak up because I wasn't a Communist; And then they came for the trade unionists, and I didn't speak up because I wasn't a trade unionist; And then they came for the Jews, and I didn't speak up because I wasn't a Jew; And then . . . they came for me . . . and by that time there was no one left to speak up." Lowell Rogers may be among the first that they're "coming for," but he won't be the last. The President has issued a presidential directive, HSD12, aiming to force all federal employees AND CONTRACTORS to carry a Smart Card. This means government employees and contractors will be the first part of the herd they pick-off. There are 1.8 million federal employees, excluding elected officials, the military, and employees of the Postal Service. But it won't end there. *https://secure.downsizedc.org/etp/campaigns/102 SEABEE'S "CAN DO", "HAVE DONE", AND WILL DO SO FOREVER. GOD BLESS AMERICA

Every member of the Armed Forces, including civilians, already has an ID card issued by the Federal Government and have had for decades. ============================================ That is not a universal ID card and is not accepted as one except in military installations, Not normally in civilian places. I have tried many tomes to show mine as ID when cashing a check and it is not accepted I had to show my Drivers License..It is just a piece of paper to them.. LEO's will tell you that you need another ID besides the Military ID. I have been told that it is illegal to be out on the street without such an ID. I have met LEO's who feel that it is not enough to satisfy their curiosity. Yet I have never been arrested for showing that ID and no other. What is the law now, concerning Identification? Quantum materiae materietur marmota monax si marmota monax materiam possit materiari?
